description:
This updated package applies a fix for the following bugs and enhancements:

* 690268 - Rebase mingw32-qpid-cpp to 0.10 for snapshot 3
solution:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously-released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.

This update is available via the Red Hat Network. Details on how to
use the Red Hat Network to apply this update are available at
http://kbase.redhat.com/faq/docs/DOC-11259
summary: Updated mingw32-qpid-cpp package that fixes bugs and provides requested enhancements is now available.
title: mingw32-qpid-cpp bug-fix update
